attr.title: Mini Doom II
attr.desc: What if Doom was a platformer instead of a first person shooter? The answer is MiniDoom 2, a fan game that pays homage to the Doom franchise by reimagining it as a 2d retro platformer. It takes the beloved cast of classic DOOM enemies and weapons and blends them with old school 80s and 90s games like Contra and Metal Slug resulting in a fast paced pixelated carnage fest with a killer heavy metal soundtrack.
attr.desc_md: What if Doom was a platformer instead of a first person shooter? The answer is MiniDoom 2, a fan game that pays homage to the Doom franchise by reimagining it as a 2d retro platformer. It takes the beloved cast of classic DOOM enemies and weapons and blends them with old school 80s and 90s games like Contra and Metal Slug resulting in a fast paced pixelated carnage fest with a killer heavy metal soundtrack.
attr.inst: Download the windows version of Mini Doom II on https://calaverastudio.itch.io/minidoom2 and copy miniDoom2-v3-1.zip in the minidoom2 port folder
attr.inst_md: Download the windows version of Mini Doom II on [itch.io](https://calaverastudio.itch.io/minidoom2) and copy miniDoom2-v3-1.zip in the minidoom2 port folder
